name: Use of seclusion, chemical restraint, or mechanical restraint prohibited
text:
The use of seclusion, chemical restraint, or mechanical restraint shall be prohibited in public schools regardless of any consent of the student, parents, or guardians. [L 2014, c 206, pt of §2]
 
Note
 
  Use of restraint in public schools; reports to 2015-2016 legislature; update prior to 2017 legislative session.  L 2014, c 206, §§4, 5.
